content:
I'm glad you're thinking about bike safety and efficiency!

Since I don't have real-time traffic information, I'll provide you with general guidance on bike-friendly routes and roads to take. Please keep in mind that you should always follow local bike laws, traffic rules, and use your best judgment when navigating the roads.

**From the studio to your apartment:**

1. From the studio, head east on Queen Anne Ave N toward W McGraw St
2. Continue on Queen Anne Ave N for approximately 0.8 miles
3. Turn left onto W Crockett St
4. Take W Crockett St for about 0.4 miles
5. Turn right onto your apartment's street (I'm assuming it's in the 98122 zip code)

This route should take you through relatively quiet streets with moderate traffic. You can also consider taking the Queen Anne Ave N bike lane, which runs along the west side of the street.

**From your apartment to the gym:**

1. From your apartment, head east on your street toward W Crockett St
2. Turn left onto W Crockett St
3. Continue on W Crockett St for about 0.2 miles
4. Turn right onto the street that leads to your gym (I'm assuming it's nearby)

Since your gym is closer to your apartment, this route should be relatively short and straightforward. You can also use online bike route planners like Google Maps or Ride with GPS to get more detailed directions and elevation profiles.

Some general tips to keep in mind:

* Always wear a helmet and follow local bike laws.
* Be aware of your surroundings, including traffic, pedestrians, and road conditions.
* Use designated bike lanes and bike paths when available.
* Consider using hand signals to indicate your intentions to turn or change lanes.
* Keep your phone charged and easily accessible in case of emergencies.

By following these routes and guidelines, you should be able to get to your apartment and gym safely and efficiently. Enjoy your ride!
